comment.body:
This is an implementation of TableModel that uses a Vector of Vectors to store the cell value objects.

Warning: Serialized objects of this class will not be compatible with future Swing releases. The current serialization support is appropriate for short term storage or RMI between applications running the same version of Swing. As of 1.4, support for long term storage of all JavaBeansTM has been added to the java.beans package. Please see {@link java.beans.XMLEncoder}. @version 1.39 12/19/03 @author Philip Milne @see TableModel @see #getDataVector
